ComicInfo.Summary: Rise Part Two: As Eddie mourns the death of his best friend, Hawk's Shadow begins his violent career as Shadowhawk. Cutting his way through a number of villains, Luke is confronted by his wheelchair bound father who claims he has no right to wear the helmet of Shadowhawk.
ComicInfo.Title: Rise Part Two
